remarks: The value of the value of vector subtraction in the dual of a vector space.  TODO: shorten with ~ ldualvsub ?  (Requires ` D ` to ` oppR ` conversion.)  (Contributed by NM, 26-Feb-2015.)
statement:
ldualvsubval.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
ldualvsubval.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
ldualvsubval.s $e |- S = ( -g ` R ) $.
ldualvsubval.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` W ) $.
ldualvsubval.d $e |- D = ( LDual ` W ) $.
ldualvsubval.m $e |- .- = ( -g ` D ) $.
ldualvsubval.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) $.
ldualvsubval.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. F ) $.
ldualvsubval.h $e |- ( ph -> H e. F ) $.
ldualvsubval.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
ldualvsubval $p |- ( ph -> ( ( G .- H ) ` X ) = ( ( G ` X ) S ( H ` X ) ) ) $.
